text: And verily We left it We preserved this deed as a sign for whomever might be admonished by it in other words the news of this deed became widely-known and endured. So is there anyone who will remember? anyone who will take heed from or be admonished by it? muddakir is actually mudhtakir but the tā’ has been replaced with a dāl likewise the dhāl and it the dāl has been assimilated with it the other dāl.
